question.text: What must a driver do at a pelican crossing when the amber light is flashing?

explanation.text: The flashing amber light allows pedestrians already on the crossing to get to the other side before a green light shows to the traffic. Be aware that some pedestrians, such as elderly people and young children, need longer to cross. Let them do this at their own pace.

answer.text: Always wait for the green light before proceeding
Give way to any pedestrians on the crossing
Wait for the red-and-amber light before proceeding
